passive.name: Thorns
passive.description: Increases the wearer's ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color>. After the wearer uses an attack, for each different enemy target the wearer hits, regenerates <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#3[f1]</unbreak></color> Energy. Each attack can regenerate Energy up to <unbreak>#4[i]</unbreak> time(s) this way. After the wearer uses their Ultimate, all allies gain <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color> SPD for 1 turn.
